pricing_page.meta_description: VocalIA pricing plans: Starter €49/month, Pro €99/month, E-commerce €99/month, Telephony €199+€0.10/min.
pricing_page.title: Transparent
pricing_page.subtitle: 14-day free trial. Start with Starter, scale at your own pace.
pricing_page.starter_desc: Voice AI assistant for your website.
pricing_page.ecom_desc: Recover carts and boost your sales.
pricing_page.faq1_a: The Telephony plan includes 100 minutes. Beyond that, extra minutes are billed at €0.10/min. This rate includes telecom infrastructure and AI processing.
pricing_page.faq2_q: Can I change my plan anytime?
pricing_page.faq2_a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade anytime. Upgrades are immediate, downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle.
pricing_page.faq3_q: What's the difference between Pro and E-commerce?
pricing_page.faq3_a: Pro is designed for services (doctors, agencies, consultants) with lead qualification and booking. E-commerce is optimized for online stores with cart recovery, product quiz and gamification.
pricing_page.faq4_a: VocalIA natively supports 5 languages: French, English, Spanish, Arabic (MSA) and Darija. Language detection is automatic.
pricing_page.faq5_q: How does the free trial work?
pricing_page.faq5_a: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. You can test all features before committing.
pricing_page.faq6_q: How long is call history retained?
pricing_page.faq6_a: Telephony call history is retained for 60 days. An automatic purge is performed on the 1st of each month. You can export your data (CSV, Excel, PDF) anytime from your dashboard to keep it longer.
pricing_page.cta_subtitle: Start with Starter, scale when you're ready.
pricing_page.volume_subtitle: Need more than 1,000 minutes/month? Contact us for custom pricing.

testimonials.title: What VocalIA Can Do
testimonials.subtitle: Discover our Voice AI platform capabilities through real-world scenarios
testimonials.quote1: VocalIA's voice assistant responds in under 2 seconds, qualifies leads with BANT scoring, and automatically syncs CRM data — in 5 languages including Darija.
testimonials.quote2: VocalIA's PSTN telephony manages appointments 24/7 with 25 function tools: booking, reminders, qualification and follow-up — all at €0.10/min with AI, personas and analytics included.
testimonials.quote3: With 203 integrated MCP tools (Shopify, WooCommerce, HubSpot, Stripe...) and 38 business personas, VocalIA adapts to any industry: real estate, healthcare, e-commerce, restaurants.

contact_page.title: Let's Talk About Your
contact_page.subtitle: Demo request, custom quote or technical question — our team responds as soon as possible.
contact_page.form_privacy_suffix: and the processing of my data.
contact_page.info_email_response: We respond as soon as possible
contact_page.faq1_a: You can test our Voice Widget with a 14-day trial directly on our website. For a complete Voice Telephony AI demo, contact us via this form.
contact_page.faq2_a: The Voice Widget can be integrated in less than 5 minutes with a simple snippet. Voice Telephony AI typically requires 1 to 2 weeks depending on your project complexity.
contact_page.faq3_q: Do you offer support in French?
contact_page.faq3_a: Yes! Support is available in French and English via email. We respond during business days.

about_page.meta_title: About - VocalIA | Our Voice AI Mission
about_page.title: Revolutionizing
about_page.subtitle: VocalIA is a Voice AI platform democratizing access to voice AI agents. Our mission: enable every business to offer an exceptional voice customer experience at a fraction of the cost of traditional solutions.
about_page.mission_p1: Traditional voice AI solutions cost between €0.15 and €0.33 per minute. We believe every business, regardless of size, deserves access to professional-quality voice AI agents.
about_page.mission_p2: That's why we developed VocalIA: a platform offering voice AI agents at €0.10/minute — transparent all-inclusive pricing with AI, personas and analytics in a single subscription.
about_page.value1_desc: We use the latest multi-provider AI technologies to offer increasingly intelligent and natural voice agents.
about_page.value2_desc: Our mission is to make voice AI accessible to all businesses, from startups to large enterprises, at a fair price.
about_page.value3_desc: 5 native languages — French, English, Spanish, Arabic and Darija — to serve your clients in Europe, MENA and worldwide.
about_page.lang_subtitle: Our voice agents speak naturally in 5 languages, with automatic visitor language detection.
about_page.cta_title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Customer Service?
about_page.cta_subtitle: Join the companies trusting VocalIA for their voice AI agents.

voice_widget_page.meta_title: Voice Widget - VocalIA | AI Voice Assistant
voice_widget_page.title: Voice Widget
voice_widget_page.subtitle: Integrate an intelligent voice AI assistant on your website in 2 minutes. Uses the browser's native Web Speech API:
voice_widget_page.widget_greeting: Hello! I'm your voice assistant. How can I help you?
voice_widget_page.widget_response: We're open Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm. Would you like to book an appointment?
voice_widget_page.steps_subtitle: Deploy your voice assistant in less than 2 minutes
voice_widget_page.step1_desc: Choose your persona, language and customize the design in the dashboard.
voice_widget_page.step2_desc: Get the automatically generated JavaScript snippet.
voice_widget_page.step3_desc: Add the script before the </body> tag of your site.

industries_healthcare_page.meta_description: Voice AI solutions for medical offices, clinics and hospitals. Appointment booking, voice reminders, patient reception.
industries_healthcare_page.hero_subtitle: Automate appointment booking, send automatic voice reminders, and offer 24/7 patient reception with a voice AI dedicated to healthcare.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge1_desc: 25% of medical appointments are missed, generating financial losses and disrupting schedules.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge2_desc: Administrative staff spends 60% of their time on the phone instead of welcoming patients.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge3_desc: Patients can only call during business hours, creating frustration and missed calls.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge4_desc: Collecting pre-consultation information is time-consuming and error-prone.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge5_desc: Post-procedure follow-up is often insufficient due to lack of resources.
industries_healthcare_page.challenge6_desc: HIPAA, GDPR Health and HDS standards require enhanced patient data security.
industries_healthcare_page.solutions_subtitle: Features specific to the medical sector
industries_healthcare_page.solution1_desc: Calendar sync, multi-practitioner management, emergency slots.
industries_healthcare_page.solution2_desc: 60% reduction in no-shows through personalized voice reminders.
industries_healthcare_page.solution3_desc: Automatic collection of symptoms and medical history before consultation.
industries_healthcare_page.solution4_desc: Automated follow-up calls with anomaly detection and practitioner alerts.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_hipaa_desc: Data encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest. No medical data stored by VocalIA.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_rgpd_desc: European hosting, cookie-free analytics (Plausible), right to be forgotten.
industries_healthcare_page.compliance_hds_desc: Each practice has isolated data with JWT authentication.
industries_healthcare_page.cta_subtitle: Request a personalized demo with our Healthcare persona.

usecases_support_page.problem_wait_desc: Customers expect a response in less than 5 minutes. Current average: 12-24h by email, 10min by phone.
usecases_support_page.problem_costs_desc: Each agent costs €35-50K/year. For 24/7 multilingual support, count on 10+ agents minimum.
usecases_support_page.problem_quality_desc: Quality varies based on agent, mood, training. Impossible to guarantee uniform experience.
usecases_support_page.features_subtitle: VocalIA combines conversational AI and business expertise for flawless support
usecases_support_page.feature_conversations_desc: AI trained on millions of support conversations. Understands context, nuances, and emotions.
usecases_support_page.feature_kb_desc: Automatic sync with your documentation, FAQ, and ticket history for always up-to-date responses.
usecases_support_page.feature_escalation_desc: Automatic detection of complex cases or VIP clients. Smooth transfer to human agent with full context.
usecases_support_page.feature_analytics_desc: Dashboard with key metrics: volume, resolution, satisfaction, trends. Automatic actionable insights.
usecases_support_page.feature_languages_desc: French, English, Spanish, Arabic and Darija. Automatic client language detection.
usecases_support_page.feature_crm_desc: Native connection with HubSpot, Zendesk, Freshdesk. Bidirectional customer data synchronization.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step1_desc: Import your FAQ, product documentation, and ticket history. The AI learns your business in 24 hours.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step2_desc: Choose from 38 business personas or create your own. Define the tone and escalation rules.
usecases_support_page.workflow_step3_desc: Web widget or telephony. Monitor performance in real-time and continuously refine.

usecases_appointments_page.meta_description: Automate appointment booking with voice AI. Calendar sync, reminders, confirmation 24/7.
usecases_appointments_page.hero_subtitle: Let AI handle your appointment bookings 24/7. Calendar synchronization, automatic reminders, reduced no-shows.
usecases_appointments_page.challenges_subtitle: Appointment management is time-consuming and error-prone
usecases_appointments_page.challenge1_desc: 15-25% of appointments are not honored, representing lost slots and missed revenue.
usecases_appointments_page.challenge2_desc: Staff spends 60% of their time on the phone instead of their main duties.
usecases_appointments_page.challenge3_desc: Clients can only book during business hours, losing after-hours requests.
usecases_appointments_page.solutions_subtitle: A voice assistant that manages your appointments automatically
usecases_appointments_page.solution1_desc: Phone appointment booking at any hour, even nights and weekends.
usecases_appointments_page.solution2_desc: Real-time synchronization with Google Calendar and Calendly.
usecases_appointments_page.solution3_desc: SMS and call reminders D-2, D-1 and H-2 to reduce no-shows.
usecases_appointments_page.solution4_desc: Clients can modify or cancel by simple voice call.
usecases_appointments_page.industries_subtitle: Automated appointment booking for all sectors
usecases_appointments_page.cta_title: Ready to automate your appointment booking?
usecases_appointments_page.cta_subtitle: Every missed call is a missed opportunity. VocalIA answers 24/7 and converts callers into confirmed appointments.
usecases_appointments_page.industry_health_desc: Medical offices, dentists, clinics. Emergency management and follow-up reminders.
usecases_appointments_page.industry_realestate_desc: Agencies, developers. Property visits, appraisals, notary signings.
usecases_appointments_page.industry_finance_desc: Banks, insurance, advisors. Consultation appointments and contract signings.
usecases_appointments_page.industry_beauty_desc: Salons, spas, coaches. Multi-service and practitioner bookings.
usecases_appointments_page.features_subtitle: Everything you need to automate your calendar
usecases_appointments_page.feature_sync_desc: Google Calendar, Calendly. Always up-to-date availability.
usecases_appointments_page.feature_reminders_desc: SMS and voice call 24h and 1h before. Drastic reduction in no-shows.
usecases_appointments_page.feature_reschedule_desc: Customer can reschedule or cancel with a simple call. Slot automatically freed.
usecases_appointments_page.feature_multipractitioner_desc: Managing schedules for multiple professionals. Smart allocation based on skills.
usecases_appointments_page.feature_prequalification_desc: Screening questions before booking. Collecting essential info to prepare the appointment.
usecases_appointments_page.feature_outbound_desc: Proactive reminder campaigns to re-engage inactive customers or confirm appointments.
usecases_appointments_page.workflow_step3_desc: Slot proposed and confirmed in real-time

usecases_leads_page.meta_description: Automatically qualify your leads with the BANT framework. Real-time scoring, CRM sync, alerts.
usecases_leads_page.hero_subtitle: Automatically qualify your prospects with the BANT framework. Real-time scoring, CRM synchronization, sales alerts.
usecases_leads_page.challenges_subtitle: Too many unqualified leads waste sales team time
usecases_leads_page.challenge1_desc: 80% of incoming leads don't match the ideal customer profile, wasting time.
usecases_leads_page.challenge2_desc: Average lead response time is 47 hours, when 78% buy from the first responder.
usecases_leads_page.challenge3_desc: Sales reps spend 40% of their time on qualification tasks instead of selling.
usecases_leads_page.bant_budget_desc: Does the prospect have the budget for your solution? The AI detects buying signals and investment capacity.
usecases_leads_page.bant_authority_desc: Is the contact a decision-maker or influencer? The AI identifies their role in the buying process.
usecases_leads_page.bant_need_desc: Is the need real and urgent? The AI evaluates business pain points and fit with your offering.
usecases_leads_page.bant_timeline_desc: When does the prospect plan to decide? The AI determines urgency and project deadlines.
usecases_leads_page.solutions_subtitle: A voice assistant that qualifies your leads automatically
usecases_leads_page.solution1_desc: Automatic questions to assess Budget, Authority, Need and Timeline.
usecases_leads_page.solution2_desc: Qualification score automatically calculated after each conversation.
usecases_leads_page.solution3_desc: Qualification data automatically sent to your CRM.
usecases_leads_page.solution4_desc: Immediate notification to sales reps for hot leads.
usecases_leads_page.cta_title: Ready to qualify your leads automatically?
usecases_leads_page.cta_subtitle: Request a demo with the BANT framework.
usecases_leads_page.bant_budget_q2: How are you financing this project?
usecases_leads_page.bant_need_q1: What problem are you trying to solve?
usecases_leads_page.bant_timeline_q1: When would you like to start?
usecases_leads_page.score_desc: At the end of each conversation, VocalIA generates a complete BANT score and action recommendation.
usecases_leads_page.feature_adaptive_desc: Questions adapt in real-time based on responses. Natural conversation, not interrogation.
usecases_leads_page.feature_transfer_desc: Qualified lead? Instant transfer to available sales rep with complete contextual briefing.
usecases_leads_page.feature_crm_desc: Score and enriched data automatically synced with HubSpot and Pipedrive.
usecases_leads_page.feature_alerts_desc: Immediate Slack/email notification for each hot lead. Don't let your prospects go cold.
usecases_leads_page.feature_analytics_desc: Visualize your funnel, identify bottlenecks, optimize your sales process.
usecases_leads_page.feature_objections_desc: AI handles common objections and follows up with hesitant leads using the right arguments.

ecommerce_page.hero_subtitle: 7 specialized AI widgets that transform passive visitors into active buyers. Cart recovery, gamification, personalized recommendations.
ecommerce_page.widgets_subtitle: Each widget is designed for a specific conversion goal. Activate only the ones you need.
ecommerce_page.widget1_desc: Automatic voice reminders by phone, SMS or email when a customer abandons their cart.
ecommerce_page.widget2_desc: Gamification with animated wheel. Capture emails in exchange for discounts (5% to 30%).
ecommerce_page.widget3_desc: Interactive voice questionnaire to recommend the right products. Templates: skincare, electronics...
ecommerce_page.widget4_desc: Visual progress toward free shipping threshold. Voice announcements at 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%.
ecommerce_page.widget5_desc: Carousel of similar and frequently bought together products with customer LTV filtering.
ecommerce_page.widget6_desc: Voice popup when visitor is about to leave. Unique: no competitor does this with voice.
ecommerce_page.widget7_desc: Real-time activity notifications: Marie just bought..., 12 people viewing this product.
ecommerce_page.widget8_desc: Native voice chat with connected product catalog (Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento...). Voice search.
ecommerce_page.connectors_subtitle: The AI reads your product catalog in real-time. Automatic sync of prices, stock, descriptions.
ecommerce_page.cta_subtitle: Install the E-commerce suite in 5 minutes. See results from the first week.
